welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Klaukkala, Finland! Prepare to be enchanted by its scenic nature, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in the city's charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
